\documentclass[border=5pt]{standalone}

\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{tikz}
\usepackage{forest}

\begin{document}

\begin{forest}for tree={rectangle,draw, l sep=20pt}[{<Program>} [{<Code>} [{<If>} [{or} [{and} [{not} [{<} [{+} [{1} ][{*} [{2} ][{5} ]]][{0} ]]][{<=} [{2} ][{0} ]]][{not} [{and} [{>} [{7} ][{2} ]][{<} [{4} ][{1} ]]]]]]]];
\end{forest}

\end{document}
